text: @RepMattGaetz @realDonaldTrump Downplaying the Coronavirus because he was concerned about his popularity, cutting the CDC budget, trying to silence health officials. Not impressive. You should be ashamed and embarrassed by your sycophancy https://t.co/0v1jXAlc3t

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
